servers.config_description: These commands will configure the IP addresses of the 16 ports on the switch. The `/31` at the end of each IP address specifies the subnet mask, which defines the network and broadcast addresses for the subnet. In this case, the subnet mask is `255.255.255.240`, which means that the network address is `10.1.1.0` and the broadcast address is `10.1.1.255`.
commands: nv set interface swp1s0 ip address 10.1.1.1/31
nv set interface swp1s1 ip address 10.1.1.2/31
nv set interface swp1s2 ip address 10.1.1.3/31
nv set interface swp1s3 ip address 10.1.1.4/31
nv set interface swp2s0 ip address 10.1.1.5/31
